#

bank of frequency resonators, params can change after starting [specs :none, input :none, freq-scale 1.0, freq-offset 0.0, decay-scale 1.0] specs - An array of three arrays: frequencies, amplitudes and ring times: 1) an array of filter frequencies, 2) an array of filter amplitudes, or nil. If nil, then amplitudes default to 1.0, 3) an array of 60 dB decay times for the filters, or nil. If nil, then decay defaults to 1.0. input - Input source. freq-scale - A scale factor multiplied by all frequencies at initialization time. freq-offset - An offset added to all frequencies at initialization time. decay-scale - A scale factor multiplied by all ring times at initialization time. A bank of frequency resonators which can be used to simulate the resonant modes of an object. Each mode is given a ring time, which is the time for the mode to decay by 60 dB. Unlike klank, the frequencies in dyn-klank can be changed after it has been started. Categories: Composite Ugen Rates: [ :ar, :kr ] Default rate: :ar

File: overtone/sc/cgens/dyn.clj Line: 43
